message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to show you this incredible product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to offer it to you for $20000. What do you think?
I'm very interested in the product, but $20000 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $18000?
I understand that $18000 is a bit of a stretch for you, Bob. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $19000. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $19000 is still a bit too high for me. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $17500?

I can see that you're really interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to make a living, so I can offer it to you for $18500. This is as low as I'm willing to go.

I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but $18500 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay a premium for this product, but I'm only willing to go up to $18000. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
